    • Method Detail

      • getInputFilePath

        public java.lang.String getInputFilePath()
        Get file path of pdf to sign
        Returns:
        Path from pdf to sign

      • getPdfHash

        public byte[] getPdfHash(java.util.Calendar signDate,
                int estimatedSize,
                java.lang.String hashAlgorithm,
                boolean isTimestampOnly)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         DocumentException,
                         java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Add signature information (reason for signing, location, contact, date) and create hash from pdf document
        Parameters:
        signDate - Date of signing
        estimatedSize - The estimated size for signatures
        hashAlgorithm - The hash algorithm which will be used to sign the pdf
        isTimestampOnly - If it is a timestamp signature. This is necessary because the filter is an other one compared to a "standard" signature
        Returns:
        Hash of pdf as bytes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the input file can not be readed
        DocumentException - If PdfStamper can not create the signature or signature appearance can not be preclosed
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If no Provider supports a MessageDigest implementation for the specified algorithm.

      • addSignatureToPdf

        private void addSignatureToPdf(byte[] externalSignature,
                     int estimatedSize)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               DocumentException
        Add a signature to pdf document
        Parameters:
        externalSignature - The extern generated signature
        estimatedSize - Size of external signature
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If estimated size is to small, signature appearance can not be closed or output file can not be written
        DocumentException - If signature appearance can not be closed

      • sign

        public void sign(java.lang.String hash,
        int estimatedSize)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 DocumentException
        Decode hash to Base64 call method to sign PDF
        Parameters:
        hash - Signature hash as Base64
        estimatedSize - Size of external signature
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If estimated size is to small, signature appearance can not be closed or output file can not be written
        DocumentException - If signature appearance can not be closed
